title: Malefactor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose any two roles. The first role must be from the good faction of this game. If you die tonight, you will appear to be the first role, and will appear to have died to the second role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start the game with a good target. You know their role.
- If you are hanged during the day and your target cast either the first or last vote against you, you appear to be their role.
- At the start of the game, all players will be informed if a Malefactor is present

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Die without being revealed as the Malefactor.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4471
*"A wretched malefactor, thus elevated to the rank of a patriot, became a martyr in the eyes of many of his compatriots."*
- Joseph Pope, *The Day of Sir John Macdonald A Chronicle of the First Prime Minister of the Dominion*
